exposurecontrol: 1) Digital Vari-Program (Auto, Auto [Flash Off], Portrait, Landscape, Sports, Close Up, Night Portrait), 2) Programmed Auto [P] 3) Shutter-Priority Auto [S] 4) Aperture Priority Auto [A] 5) Manual [M]
sensitivity: ISO  200 to 3,200 in steps of 1/3 EV, plus  HI-0.3, HI-0.5, HI-0.7, HI-1 (ISO  6400); sensitivity decreases approx.  LO-0.3, LO-0.5, LO-0.7 and LO-1  (ISO 100)
exposuremeteringrangeatnormaltemperature: 1) 0 to 20 EV (3D-Color Matrix or Center-weighted metering) 2) 2 to 20 EV (Spot metering)
playbackfunction: 1)  Full frame, 2) Thumbnail (4, 9, 72 and  calendar), 3) Magnifying  playback, 4) movie playback, 5) Pictmotion,  6) Slide show, 7) Histogram  indication, 8) Highlights point display, 8)  Auto image rotation, 9)  Image comment
fileformat: NEF (12 bit compressed RAW) JPEG (Baseline-compliant) AVI (Motion JPEG compression format with monaural sound)
selftimer: Electronically controlled timer with duration of 2, 5, 10 or 20 s.
autoexposurebracketing: 2 to 3 exposures in increments of 1/3, 1/2, 2/3, 1 or 2 steps to (+-) 1.0 EV
flashcontrol: 1)TTL  flash control with 420-pixel RGB  sensor; i-TTL balanced fill-flash and  standard i-TTL fill flash  available with SB-900, 800, 600 or 400 2) Auto aperture available with SB-900, 800 and CPU lens 3) Non-TTL auto available with SB-900, 800, 28, 27 or 22s 4) Range-priority manual available with SB-900, 800.
autofocus: TTL  phase detection by Nikon Multi-CAM  1000 autofocus module with AF-assist  (range approx. 0.5-3m/1ft 8 in. -  9ft 10 in.); Detection range: -1 to  +19 EV (ISO 100 at (ISO 100 at  20Â°C/68Â°F)
synccontact: X-contact only; flash synchronization at up to 1/200 sec
deletefunction: 1) Card format, 2) All frames delete, 3) Selected frames delete
focusingscreen: Type B BriteView Clear Matte Mark II screen
flashsyncmodes: 1) Auto, 2) Fill-in flash, 3) Red-eye reduction, 4) Red-eye reduction with Slow sync, 5) Slow sync, 6) Rear-curtain sync, 7) Off
otherfeatures: Retouch  menu, Info Display on LCD  monitor, Intergrated Dust Reductions System,  Live view (with  face-priority AF), D-Movie, Pictmotion
lcdmonitor: 3.0", 920,000-dot low-temperature polysilicon TFT LCD, allows up to 170-degree wide viewing angle
powerrequirements: Rechargeable Li-ion Battery EN-EL3e, AC Adapter EH-5a (optional)
exposuremeteringsystem: 1)  3D-Color Matrix Metering II (type G  and D lenses); Color Matrix  Metering II (other CPU lenses) performed by  420-segment RGB sensor 2) Center-weighted: Weight of 75% given to 6, 8 or 10mm circle in center of frame 3) Spot: Meters 3.5mm circle (approx. 2% of frame) centered on active focus area
supportedlanguages: Total  of 17 languages: Chinese  (Simplified and Traditional), Danish, Dutch,  English, Finnish, French,  German, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian,  Polish, Portuguese,  Russian, Spanish, Swedish
shootingmodes: 1) Single frame shooting mode 2) Continous low shooting mode: 1-4fps 3) Continous high shooting mode: 4.5fps 4) Self-timer mode 5) Delay remote mode 6) Quick-response remote mode 7) D-Movie
imagesensor: Nikon DX format (23.6 x 15.8 mm) CMOS sensor
focusmodes: 1) Autofocus (AF): Single-servo AF (AF-S); Continous-servo AF (AF-C); Auto AF-S/AF-C selection (AF-A) 2) Manual focus (M) can be selected from 11 focus area
whitebalance: Auto  (TTL white-balance with 420-pixel  RGB sensor), 12 manual modes with  fine-tuning; color temperature  setting; preset white balance; white  balance bracketing
shutter: Electronically controlled vertical-travel focal plane shutter, 30 to 1/4000sec in steps of 1/3 EV plus bulb
suppliedaccessoriesmaydifferbycountryora: Rechargeable  Li-ion Battery EN-EL3e,  Quick Charger MH-18a, USB Cable UC-E4, Video  Cable EG-D2, Camera Strap  AN-DC1, Body Cap BF-1A, Accessory Shoe Cover  BS-1, LCD Monitor Cover  BM-10, Software Suite CD-ROM
viewfinder: Fixed eye-level pentaprism; built-in diopter adjustment (-2 to +1 m-1)
